title: Relationship between potentially toxic elements and macrophyte communities in the Sava river
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Snežana Jarić, Branko Karadžić, Momir Paunović, Radmila Milačič, Janez Ščančar, Olga Kostić, Tea Zuliani, Janja Vidmar, Zorana Miletić, Stefan Anđus, Miroslava Mitrović, Pavle Pavlović
